text: Hi Krish, correct me if im wrong but according to this blog post: https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2020/10/time-series-forecasting-using-facebook-prophet-library-in-python/ Prophet can handle any kind of (stationary / non stationary) time-series data (we dont have to shift).

author: @Avi-ol7xl
text: The forecast you showed is daily, however, the data that we had is monthly. I think it's not right because you have used monthly data where the model only understands that it has value for every 1st of the month and overfit other values. I suppose there is a high posterior variance in between, You should have changed frequency in making forecast data frame to represent monthly forecast. Could have made more sense. Happy Learning :)
